titles.title: A bill to authorize a major medical facility project for the Department of Veterans Affairs at Denver, Colorado.
A bill to authorize a major medical facility project for the Department of Veterans Affairs at Denver, Colorado.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a major medical facility project for a replacement facility for the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center, Denver, Colorado.
